Posts.Content: Hi blue tit I would love to start swimming again, you say this one is light weight but i am quite big busted so i am a bit worried it might look odd .ie. one big heavy boob and one light weight one or do you think it would be suitable for us larger ladies.
Posts.Title: Beanie boobie

Posts.Content: Hi all I was just wondering if any of you have been told certain foods to eat or avoid, I had HeR2 pos breast cancer and a friend of mine has just been told to avoid soya products.   so i was just wondering if anyone else has been told this. thanks
Posts.Title: cancer and diet

Posts.Content: hello all just had my first dose of herceptin can anyone tell me if they have had any side effects today from this please
Posts.Title: herceptin

Posts.Content: hello i was diognosed in june and did not have my op until the 15th of oct, due to having a few biopsies like you i was worried as after the biopsy my lump did feel like it was getting bigger and i was terrified it was spreading even though i was told it would not. but when i had my op a mascectomy the lump was exactly the same as what it was at diognosis, so please try not to worry about this it is just swelling due to the biopsy.  i am awaiting my first chemo now not looking forward to that, let us know how you are doing. lv jane
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed - very scared and emotional

Posts.Content: Hello Everyone I have been feeling really down and totally worn out lately i have just had a blood test to check my thyroid levels, just wondered if i can take a tonic like metatone if i am taking tamoxifen and still having herceptin thanks
Posts.Title: Taking a tonic

Posts.Content: hi  i also have her2 pos cancer, i had my breast removed in august and have just had third chemo, due to start herceptin at the end of the month, dont really know what info you need feel free to ask me anything if i can help i will
